title: Problem of conservation: Our natural resources

description: Episode of Series "Environment in crisis: problems of conservation". Provides a broad overview of developing crises in world natural resources. Establishes man's reliance upon and misuse of such resources and describes current conservation efforts. Produced in collaboration with Allan A. Sollers, author of "Ours is our Earth."
